blurb: Drift beyond the edge of known space where ancient signals echo through the void. In Cosmos, every decision shapes your fate among the stars.

S01.text: The stars stretch endlessly before you. Sensors hum softly as an unfamiliar signal bleeds through the static.

S02.text: The signal sharpens, revealing a pattern older than any known civilization.

S03.text: Silence envelops the ship. Whatever called out to you waits patiently in the dark.
